TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputReset extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton

Docs.summary: サーバーの HTML 要素へのプログラムによるアクセスを可能にします。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that resets form controls to their initial values. The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control is often used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control, which is used to create a button control that submits the form.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control to reset the values of a form on a Web page.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset/CS/htmlinputresetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset/VB/htmlinputresetvb.aspx#1)]
